meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Effing! I can't believe I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: Effing mosquitoes always ruin my outdoor picnics.
meanings.sent3: Effing traffic made me late for work, again!
meanings.sent4: The effing rain poured down just as I finished washing my car.
meanings.sent5: The effing thunder shook the windows, scaring the cat.

meanings.definition: Used as a euphemism for the expletive 'fucking.'
meanings.sent1: That effing movie was so scary, I couldn't sleep.
meanings.sent2: I can't believe you ate the last effing cookie!
meanings.sent3: She gave me an effing hard puzzle to solve.
meanings.sent4: The effing heat wave made everyone miserable.
meanings.sent5: The effing mountain was a tough climb, but the view was worth it.
